mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum num, A.* from ( select * from board order by bId desc) A where rownum <= (#{curPage}-1) * #{listCount} + #{listCount} ) B where B.num >= (#{curPage}-1) * #{listCount} + 1
mapper.insert: insert into board (bId, id, name, title, content) values (board_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, #{title}, #{content})
